author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Game Asset Management - [Revelar]
description: Managing multiple NFT projects (pre and post launch) is difficult and hard to track down assets for support.
solution: Create an easy web app for any project to manage their NFT Assets with a robust dashboard for multiple projects & users.
experience: A decade as a Tech Founder & CTO + Plutus Pioneer + Fund 6 + alongside a full team of engineers. (See below)
